name: Corebreaker
description:
Corebreaker is a fast-paced action-platform shooter game with roguelite elements. It is the answer for the following question:

“What if we combine Mega Man action, closed room battle, a bunch of powerful weapons, abilities and upgrades into a single package?”

Features
  • Crisp controls and fluid movement.
  • Unlock permanent abilities.
  • Powerful upgrades and weapons.
  • Boss fight.
Development

Corebreaker is still in alpha state and in active development. Please consider giving us your feedback to help us improve the game. Any idea or suggestion is always welcome! :)
